title: Check in later
subtitle: Deferred presence; survival speech
description: A micro-movement in endurance marking the shift from articulation to maintenance. A status marker representing physical depletion and the preservation of affection while energy is low.

motifMap.symbol: A lamp left on in an empty room
motifMap.meaning: Presence that is still here but not currently available

motifMap.symbol: Note on the table: back later
motifMap.meaning: Deferred presence; a keep-alive ping for connection

excerpt: I am still here. Just not available right now.

integrity.notes: Generated based on Phase Analysis 3.0 for Check in later. Phase identified as Candle Adrift edging toward The Candle’s Glow.
